column4: cansum1 plz help..my login window is not displayed when i start ubuntu ...i have to blind type my username and password.does any1 know hpow to fix this?
ï»¿can someone plz help..my login window is not displayed when i start ubuntu ...i have to blind type my username and password.does any1 know hpow to fix this?
quick answer... try going into synaptic (Applications->System->Synaptic package manager) and try searching for 'login'
and redownload your login screen stuff
